snippet: J. Scott Gration’s resignation as ambassador to Kenya put him alongside other military commanders who struggled in civilian posts under the Obama administration.
abstract: J Scott Gration's abrupt resignation as ambassador to Kenya puts him alongside other military commanders who have struggled in civilian posts in the Obama administration; Gration's resignation preempted the release of an internal audit that was highly critical of his brusque management style.
lead_paragraph: J. Scott Gration’s resignation as ambassador to Kenya put him alongside other military commanders who struggled in civilian posts under the Obama administration.

headline.seo: Kenya Envoy’s Exit Shows Tough Transition From Military Life
headline.main: Ambassador’s Exit Shows Difficulties of Moving From Military to Diplomatic Circles
headline.print_headline: Ambassador’s Exit Shows Difficulties of Moving From Military to Diplomatic Circles

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
